r.s: Abstract base class for HTML classes (PHP5 port of HTML_Common package).
r.d: The HTML_Common2 package provides methods for HTML code display and attributes handling. * Provides methods to set, remove, merge HTML attributes. * Handles global document options (charset, linebreak and indentation characters). * Provides methods to handle indentation and HTML comments (useful in subclasses).
r.n: * Use phpunit/PHPUnit rather than pear/PHPUnit2 for unit testing needs * "Fluent interfaces": all methods that didn't return anything now return $this. The following methods are affected: mergeAttributes(), removeAttribute(), setAttribute(), setAttributes(), setComment() and setIndentLevel().
